backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access-controlled admin/user actions, and a full inquiry system with status tracking and sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two mobile-number prompt features to affected React files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, theme layers, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring the router, query client, layout, and global mobile-number prompt provider.
frontend/src/components/site/AgentApplic: Form component for submitting agent applications with validation, mutation handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingCon: Floating call and WhatsApp buttons linked via helper utilities and displayed on all pages.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryForm: A form component that collects inquiry details, validates required fields, and submits data using useSubmitInquiry with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/site/MobileNumbe: A modal prompting users for a validated mobile number before continuing, with input normalization and error messaging.
Context provider that intercepts clicks to show a mobile-number prompt modal and executes the original action afterward, storing session completion state.
Footer displaying contact info, quick links, and attribution, using getPhoneLink and dynamic year.
Header with navigation links and branding, conditionally showing an Admin link based on useIsCallerAdmin.
frontend/src/components/site/VillupuramM: Component embedding a Google Maps iframe showing Villupuram’s location with optional toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to user identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting inquiries and agent applications through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAgentApplica: Exports a mutation hook to submit new agent applications and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Exports a mutation hook to submit new inquiries and refresh inquiry lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, themes, typography, and LIC-specific utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Generates phone and WhatsApp links, including prefilled WhatsApp messages for user prompts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutLicPage.tsx: Presents a styled informational page describing LIC, its offerings, and its history.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApplicationsPage: Admin interface for viewing, sorting, updating, and deleting agent applications with status dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard that checks admin access and links to manage inquiries and agent applications.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInquiriesPage.ts: Admin interface for viewing, sorting, updating, and deleting customer inquiries with status management.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, call-to-action buttons, and an inquiry form with a map embed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring LIC overview, call-to-action buttons, benefits, and introductory content.
frontend/src/pages/JoinAsAgentPage.tsx: Promotes LIC agent recruitment with benefits overview and an application form.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed sections describing various LIC policy types with benefits and CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page rendering a styled services grid with icons and descriptions for various LIC-related offerings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s current state, requirements, design notes, and existing features for the LIC website.
